mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MARKET.ORDERDETAIL (ODNUM, ICODE, ONUM, ODSTOCK, OPRICE, STORE) VALUES(ODNUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT DISTINCT ICODE FROM INVENPRICE i2 WHERE ICODE =#{icode}), (SELECT ONUM FROM "ORDER" o WHERE ONUM =#{onum}), #{odstock}, (SELECT OPRICE FROM INVENPRICE i2 WHERE ICODE =#{icode} AND CDATE = (SELECT MAX(CDATE) FROM INVENPRICE i WHERE ICODE = #{icode} GROUP BY ICODE)), (SELECT STORE FROM SELLER s WHERE STORE=#{store}))
mapper.update: UPDATE "ORDER" SET ODATE = SYSDATE , ROADADDR = #{roadaddr}, ADDR = #{addr}, DELIVERYSELECT = 'Y', OSTATE ='D' WHERE ONUM =#{onum}
UPDATE "ORDER" SET ODATE = SYSDATE , OSTATE ='P' WHERE ONUM =#{onum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COUPONBOX c WHERE c.CSEQ =#{cseq} AND c.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MILEAGE (MSEQ,ID,MMONEY,MDATE,MSTATE) VALUES(MSEQ_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{id},(SELECT FLOOR(PAYMENTAMT * 0.01) FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENTNUM = #{paymentnum}),SYSDATE, 'P')
